content: the crocheting guidance available as following orange style https //youtu be/oc8gr7udk-4 black style https //youtu be/5sl1tsfywoc camel style https //youtu be/ddbpm4r1hs4 **get yarn kit now** https //susudiy myshopify com/products/cat-pillowcase this cushion cover is designed in the shape of a chubby cat combining various types of yarn for a rich color palette it features a zipper on the opening which can be used as a pillow or a seat cushion it s a great home accessory providing warm companionship **material** needle zipper glue stuffing water-soluble pen non-woven fabric 10*10cm - dark red and light pink **yarn amount** black style no 2 thread 13# - 4 dawn impression 14# - 1 4ply cotton 30# - 1 camel style no 2 thread 08# - 4 dawn impression 09# - 1 4ply cotton 08# - 1 4ply cotton 33# - 1 orange style no 2 thread 32# - 4 dawn impression 28# - 1 4ply cotton 53# - 1 the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project and we hope that during the process you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used please visit our youtube channel - susan s family to view them you can also find us at https //www instagram com/susansfamily2013/ more product can be found in this account please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you d like to know immediately when there s anew video up
